## KEGG enrichment for `r my_contrast_name`

```{r }
res_file <-
  file.path("intermediate_results",
            paste0(my_contrast_name, "_results.rds"))
res <- readRDS(res_file)
sig_vec <- get_de_vector(res, alpha = my_alpha, 
                         up_log2fc_th = my_log2fc_th, 
                         down_log2fc_th = -my_log2fc_th)
log2fc_vec <- get_log2fc_vector(res) 
```

```{r results="asis"}
if (all(levels(sig_vec) == c(0, 1))) {
  entrez_sig_vec <- map_sig_vec_ensembl_to_entrez(sig_vec, ensembl_to_entrez_map)
  entrez_log2fc_vec <- map_log2fc_vec_ensembl_to_entrez(log2fc_vec, ensembl_to_entrez_map)
  
  cat(knitr::knit_child(
    text = knitr::knit_expand("one_kegg.Rmd"),
    quiet = T
  ))
} else{
   cat(knitr::knit_child(
    text = "Since there are no differential regulated genes for this contrast we cannot perform a KEGG enrichment analysis.",
    quiet = T
  ))
}
```
